title: Celebrations: Wedding (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Wedding subcategory within Celebrations. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.japanese: ご結婚おめでとうございます！

cards.english: We are getting married in June.
cards.romaji: Watashitachi wa roku-gatsu ni kekkon shimasu.
cards.japanese: 私たちは六月に結婚します。
